topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598d8fe63687258770008ad#post_5598d8fe63687258770008ad
Pretty much in the same boat.

I stopped going to school for a lot of reasons. First of all I was getting Sick of all the bad teachers I would constantly get.

But mostly I was dealing with a lot of stress in my life at the time. With things going on at home. Family being short on money. so we lost our power at times.

Having to deal with a terrible Step-Dad so I would stay in my room all day. I was just really depressed and stressed out. 

And than after all that having to go to school, Deal with loud kids, dumb teachers, And try and past Tests with my Learning disadvantages.

Just, Fuck. 

But like you I'm doing better now. I'm aiming at getting my GED and calling it there.
